mapper.select:
SELECT T.GUID AS guid, T.COMPNAYID AS compnayid, T.SUITID AS suitid, T.CODE AS code, T.CUSTOMERID AS customerid, T.CUSTOMERNAME AS customername, T.SALETYPE AS saletype, T.SALETYPENAME AS saletypename, T.SENDDATE AS senddate, T.BILLCODE AS billcode, T.ADDRESS AS address, T.CONTACTNAME AS contactname, T.CONTACTPHONE AS contactphone, T.REMARK AS remark, T.USERID AS userid, T.USERNAME AS username, T.CREATEDATE AS createdate, T.SUMMOUNT AS summount, T.SUMMONEY AS summoney, T.PREMONEY AS premoney, T.CAPITAL AS capital, T.STATUSINFO AS statusinfo, T.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID AS processInstanceId, T.STATUS AS status, T.SORT AS sort FROM preorder T
ORDER BY SORT

SELECT T.GUID AS guid, T.COMPNAYID AS compnayid, T.SUITID AS suitid, T.CODE AS code, T.CUSTOMERID AS customerid, T.CUSTOMERNAME AS customername, T.SALETYPE AS saletype, T.SALETYPENAME AS saletypename, T.SENDDATE AS senddate, T.BILLCODE AS billcode, T.ADDRESS AS address, T.CONTACTNAME AS contactname, T.CONTACTPHONE AS contactphone, T.REMARK AS remark, T.USERID AS userid, T.USERNAME AS username, T.CREATEDATE AS createdate, T.SUMMOUNT AS summount, T.SUMMONEY AS summoney, T.PREMONEY AS premoney, T.CAPITAL AS capital, T.STATUSINFO AS statusinfo, T.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID AS processInstanceId, T.STATUS AS status, T.SORT AS sort, D.GUID AS d_guid, D.APPLYID AS applyid, D.PRODUCTID AS productid, D.PRODUCTNAME AS productname, D.IMGURL AS imgurl, D.NORMAL AS normal, D.UNIT AS unit, D.AMOUNT AS d_amount, D.PRICE AS price, D.SALEPRICE AS saleprice, D.SUMMONEY AS d_summoney, D.CREATEDATE AS d_createdate, D.SORT AS d_sort, D.STATUS AS d_status FROM preorder T LEFT JOIN preorderdetail D ON T.GUID=D.APPLYID
ORDER BY SORT
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO preorder ( GUID, COMPNAYID, SUITID, CODE, CUSTOMERID, CUSTOMERNAME, SALETYPE, SALETYPENAME, SENDDATE, BILLCODE, ADDRESS, CONTACTNAME, CONTACTPHONE, REMARK, USERID, USERNAME, CREATEDATE, SUMMOUNT, SUMMONEY, PREMONEY, CAPITAL, STATUSINFO, PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID, STATUS, SORT ) VALUES ( #{guid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{compnayid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{suitid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{saletype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{saletypename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{senddate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{billcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{summount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{summoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{premoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{capital,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{statusinfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{processInstanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM preorder WHERE GUID IN
#{id}
